name: ldapsearch
long_help: This command allows users to perform LDAP search operations against specified directories, enabling enumeration of users, groups, and other objects in an Active Directory environment.

arguments.name: ldap_attributes
arguments.desc: Specific attributes to retrieve from LDAP entries.

arguments.name: results_count
arguments.desc: Limit on the number of results to return.

arguments.name: hostname
arguments.desc: Hostname or IP address of the Domain Controller.

arguments.name: domain
arguments.desc: Distinguished Name (DN) to use for the query base.

arguments.name: ldaps
arguments.desc: Use LDAPS for the connection (1 for true, 0 for false).
